title: Interprofessional Simulation Education in Emergency Medicine

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical terminology and understanding of emergency response protocols
context.additional_context: Practice-centered education emphasizing COVID-19 response and multidisciplinary teamwork

learning_goals: Learners achieve over 80% proficiency in effective communication strategies using TeamSTEPPS tools in emergency scenarios
Learners practice role distribution and collaboration procedures among medical staff at least three times through simulation scenarios
Learners derive and present at least two teamwork improvement strategies through debriefing

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
